# Preface {.unnumbered}

Welcome to the big bee book!

This book features detailed annotations of bees of the PNW. Images have been collected from [iNaturalist](https://www.inaturalist.org/), and special thanks to [Spencer Collection](https://www.zoology.ubc.ca/entomology/) for allowing us to reproduce their specimen images as references for this book

How to use: 

* Look up your favourite bees
* Compare with your own observations to help identify species
* Click any image to be taken to the database source

Bees are organized by genus.
